title: [Control Systems] Moxa security advisory (AV25-181)
description: On April 2, 2025, Moxa published security advisories to address a critical vulnerability in the following products:
products: EDF-G1002-BP Series - firmware version 3.14 and prior
EDR-810 Series - firmware version 5.12.39 and prior
EDR-8010 Series - firmware version 3.14 and prior
EDR-G9004 Series - firmware version 3.14 and prior
EDR-G9010 Series - firmware version 3.14 and prior
OnCell G4302-LTE4 Series - firmware version 3.14 and prior
TN-4900 Series - firmware version 3.14 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
